title: failure everytime I update the client
body: Every time I try to update the client nothing happens then when I hit launch it says unsupported 16bit.

replies.body: There may be something going on with your OS settings or hard drive that's not reading League properly.  As a first step, run over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure your settings are configured to allow league as an exception.  If possible and you're on Windows, run a system file checker to make sure there aren't any bad sections.  I hope that helps!
